title: (x) Script and one big O - Caflisch Script {Tiffany}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023141715im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ottaviologo_5458.jpg)
  
I need both here: the big O and the script (which looks familiar, but I'm thrown by the 'tt' ligature). (Already know the bottom line is Agency.)
author: elzadra

comments.content: The script is Caflisch Script from Adobe. Or at least once upon a time it was Caflisch.

Script: Cafflish Script

Ops, I let the comment open while searching for this O and when posted there was already an answer. The O is near to Utopia Caption Italic, but not exactly equal.
